more-about-kiva-text-1: Kiva is an international nonprofit, founded in 2005 and based in San Francisco, with a mission to connect people through lending to alleviate poverty. We celebrate and support people looking to create a better future for themselves, their families and their communities.
more-about-kiva-text-2: 100% of funds lent on Kiva go to funding loans. Optional donations fund Kivaâ€™s operations.
